channel.title: [Delta] Prevent same IP wilderness fighting

item.title: [Delta] Prevent same IP wilderness fighting
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I’m trying to get rid of people getting two clients, logging in, and killing themselves. I know what to put, but I can’t find the void it needs to go under.

if (connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(other.connectedFrom) || other.connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(connectedFrom)) { sM("Same IP found, you cannot attack yourself in the wilderness!"); return; }

Read full topic
